page.title: 10The Post Office.W.Tytherley.
page.content: It is owned by Mr.and Miss Button and is open from 7.45 to 1p.m.and 2 to 6.30 Mondays to Fridays also 8 till 1p.m. on Saturdays.It closes on Sundays but opens 8.30 to 10.30 on Bank Holidays. Fresh food (bread,vegetables,meat) is sold and frozen food together with a wide range of groceries and confectionary.One part is for newspapers,magazines,cards and wrapping paper.A mixture of other goods includes cigarettes,tobacco, medicines,films,china,toys and electrical items.A notice board is provided for notices of fetes etc. Doctors prescriptions are deliverd and collected.Flags are sold on flag days. The post office section is for pensions,allowances,stamps,savings, licences,and the Giro Bank.
